name: In Reverence for a Captain
description:
A stressed lab worker has begun to have strange thoughts recently.

If you enjoyed this, consider voting for it in the Inkjam! Thank you.

In Reverence for a Captain was made in three days for Inkjam 2021. 

Check out the other entries here!
